17#pragma once
18
19#include "Result.h"
20#include "DecodeHints.h"
21
22#include <cstdint>
23
24namespace ZXing {
25
26enum class ImageFormat : uint32_t
27{
28 None = 0,
29 Lum = 0x01000000,
30 RGB = 0x03000102,
31 BGR = 0x03020100,
32 RGBX = 0x04000102,
33 XRGB = 0x04010203,
34 BGRX = 0x04020100,
35 XBGR = 0x04030201,
36};
37
38constexpr inline int PixStride(ImageFormat format) { return (static_cast<uint32_t>(format) >> 3*8) & 0xFF; }
39constexpr inline int RedIndex(ImageFormat format) { return (static_cast<uint32_t>(format) >> 2*8) & 0xFF; }
40constexpr inline int GreenIndex(ImageFormat format) { return (static_cast<uint32_t>(format) >> 1*8) & 0xFF; }
41constexpr inline int BlueIndex(ImageFormat format) { return (static_cast<uint32_t>(format) >> 0*8) & 0xFF; }
42
43/**
44 * Simple class that stores a non-owning const pointer to image data plus layout and format information.
45 */
46class ImageView
47{
48 const uint8_t* _data = nullptr;
49 ImageFormat _format;
50 int _width = 0, _height = 0, _pixStride = 0, _rowStride = 0;
51
52 friend Result ReadBarcode(const ImageView&, const DecodeHints&);
53 friend class ThresholdBinarizer;
54
55public:
56 /**
57 * ImageView contructor
58 *
59 * @param data pointer to image buffer
60 * @param width image width in pixels
61 * @param height image height in pixels
62 * @param format image/pixel format
63 * @param rowStride optional row stride in bytes, default is width * pixStride
64 * @param pixStride optional pixel stride in bytes, default is calculated from format
65 */
66 ImageView(const uint8_t* data, int width, int height, ImageFormat format, int rowStride = 0, int pixStride = 0)
67 : _data(data), _format(format), _width(width), _height(height),
68 _pixStride(pixStride ? pixStride : PixStride(format)), _rowStride(rowStride ? rowStride : width * _pixStride)
69 {}
70
71 const uint8_t* data(int x, int y) const { return _data + y * _rowStride + x * _pixStride; }
72};
73
74/**
75 * Read barcode from an ImageView
76 *
77 * @param buffer view of the image data including layout and format
78 * @param hints optional DecodeHints to parameterize / speed up decoding
79 * @return #Result structure
80 */
81Result ReadBarcode(const ImageView& buffer, const DecodeHints& hints = {});
82
83
84[[deprecated]]
85Result ReadBarcode(int width, int height, const uint8_t* data, int rowStride,
86 BarcodeFormats formats = {}, bool tryRotate = true, bool tryHarder = true);
87
88[[deprecated]]
89Result ReadBarcode(int width, int height, const uint8_t* data, int rowStride, int pixelStride, int rIndex, int gIndex, int bIndex,
90 BarcodeFormats formats = {}, bool tryRotate = true, bool tryHarder = true);
91
92} // ZXing
93
